Arifin Tasrif Mau Sisir Proyek Energi Baru Terbarukan yang Mangkrak
06 Nov 2019, 04:30 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Menteri Energi dan Sumber Daya Mineral (ESDM) Arifin Tasrif/Foto: Achmad Dwi Afriyadi

Jakarta - Realisasi energi baru terbarukan (EBT) dalam bauran energi nasional masih minim. Pemerintah mencatat, setidaknya baru sekitar 8% yang terealisasi dari potensi yang ada.Terkait hal tersebut, Menteri Energi dan Sumber Daya Mineral (ESDM) Arifin Tasrif mengatakan akan melakukan pendataan pada proyek-proyek EBT yang mangkrak."Mau kita inventarisir (proyek mangkrak)," kata Arifin usai membuka The 8th Indonesia EBTKE Conex di JIEXpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Saat ditanya strategi serta kebijakan untuk mendorong EBT, Arifin mengatakan akan melakukan evaluasi. Selain itu, pihaknya juga akan duduk bersama dengan pemangku kepentingan terkait sehingga pemerintah bisa menentukan strategi ke depannya."Kita akan evaluasi bagaimana mempercepat itu memang akselerasi dirasakan kecepatan agak kurang. Kita perlu duduk sama-sama dengan stakeholder sehingga kita bisa menentukan strategi dan rencana yang memang kita bisa laksanakan," ujarnya.Saat membuka acara, Arifin bilang potensi EBT mencapai 400 gigawatt (GW). Namun, saat ini baru terealisasi 8%."Sumber-sumber energi terbarukan menurut informasi ada 400 GW dan ini akan saya hitung. Dan baru terealisasi kira-kira 8% kalau tidak salah, tapi 8% kok 32 GW. Jadi masih kecil sekali," terangnya. Simak Video "Blusukan Perdana Jonan ke Freeport Usai 51% Sahamnya Dikuasai RI"[Gambas:Video 20detik](ara/ara)

Arifin Tasrif Wants to Combat a Stalled Renewable Energy Project
Nov 6 2019, 04:30 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources (ESDM) Arifin Tasrif / Photo: Achmad Dwi Afriyadi

Jakarta - Realization of new renewable energy (EBT) in the national energy mix is still minimal. The government notes, at least only about 8% has been realized from the existing potential. Related to this, the Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources (ESDM) Arifin Tasrif said that he would collect data on stalled EBT projects. , "Arifin said after opening The 8th Indonesia EBTKE Conex at JIEXpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). When asked about strategies and policies to encourage EBT, Arifin said he would conduct an evaluation. In addition, his party will also sit together with relevant stakeholders so that the government can determine the strategy going forward. "We will evaluate how to accelerate the acceleration is felt to be somewhat lacking. We need to sit together with stakeholders so that we can determine the strategies and plans that are indeed we can do it, "he said. When opening the event, Arifin said the potential of EBT reached 400 gigawatts (GW). However, currently only 8% has been realized. "According to information, there are 400 GW of renewable energy sources and this will be calculated. And only 8% has been realized if I'm not mistaken, but 8% really are 32 GW. So it's still very small, "he explained. Check out the video "Jonan Blusukan Prime to Freeport After 51% of its Shares Are controlled by RI" [Gambas: Video 20second] (fig / fig)
